News.headline: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 31st October
News.page_title: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 31st October
News.URL_keywords: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 31st October
News.short_description: Come and watch West Ham’s up and coming talent in their fourth home U23 fixture against West Bromwich Albion U23 to see if they can keep their unbeaten streak at home.
News.description:
Just coming off the back of a 1-0 win away at Middlesbrough U23 with a goal from Jahmal Hector-Ingram the Hammers are determined to push on, continue to improve and make a challenge for the title this year.

The game will be played on Monday 31st October, with a 7:00pm kick off.

West Ham United U23 Previous Results:
Middlesbrough 0-1 West Ham
Aston Villa 2-0 West Ham
Leicester City 0-2 West Ham
West Ham 0-0 Brighton and Hove Albion
Norwich City 0-2 West Ham

With 8 goals involved in West Ham's first three home U23 games, and first team players such as Sofiane Feghouli and Edimilson Fernandes playing in previous U23 fixtures for West Ham, it’s got the recipe to be a great night of Football here at the Chigwell Construction Stadium.

The Night is free for West Ham Season Ticket holders, but everyone is welcome with tickets priced at £5 for adults and £3 concessions. The Clubhouse will be open to enjoy before and after the game.
